name: Birdie Hunter
quote: You've proven your ability to stalk the fairways, pounce on opportunities, and snag those elusive birdies with precision. Whether you're navigating dense woods or wide-open fields, your keen eye and steady hand ensure no birdie escapes your grasp.
functionalDescription: Denna badge får du genom att göra ett visst antal totala birdies

name: Bird Collector
quote: While others chase birdies in vain, you’ve made an art of it — collecting them across courses like rare treasures. With precision and poise, you’ve proven yourself a true Bird Collector, leaving a trail of chirping triumphs in your wake.
functionalDescription: gör minst 3 birdies på ett antal olika banor

name: Bullseye Hunter
quote: The sacred center. No excuses, no nerves, no mercy. This is where putts are supposed to drop — and if they don't, you might want to fake an injury. Land here, and you've done what every player dreams of: parked it so close even your cardmates can't help but clap (or curse). The realm of tap-ins, glory, and just a hint of smug satisfaction.
functionalDescription: landa i bullseye ett totalt antal gånger

name: Course Hunter
quote: You’re no ordinary player — like the legendary Hopparcarlsson, you bound from course to course with mythical agility and curiosity. Hills, valleys, and treacherous fairways — you’ve conquered them all.
functionalDescription: Denna badge rankas upp beroende på hur många olika banor du har spelat.

name: Distance Hunter
quote: From short layouts to monster courses, your legs have seen it all. Congrats, Distance Hunter — who needs a gym membership when chasing plastic already makes you a world traveler?
functionalDescription: Denna badge har att göra med den totala längden på banorna man har spelat. Så om man spelar en bana på totalt 25 km, så har man klarat silver tier badge. Spelar man samma bana igen ska den addera layoutens längd till totalen.

name: Eagle Hunter
quote: You don't just play the fairway — you own it. As an Eagle Hunter, you've unleashed precision drives and fearless putts to conquer what few can: scoring two under par. Whether it's a perfect flex line through the woods or a monster putt from downtown, you've proven that eagles aren't luck — they're skill, focus, and a little disc magic.
description: Score your first eagle
functionalDescription: hur många antal eagles man gör totalt

name: Rollercoaster
quote: Every hole a thrill ride! You turned the match into a whirlwind of highs and lows, surprises, and nail-biting moments. Who needs boring consistency when you can conquer the course with pure chaos and come out on top? Strap in
description: Finish a round without a single par.
functionalDescription: när man spelar en runda utan ett ända par

name: Make a wish
quote: You took a stroll on three holes. Ace. Birdie. Par. The perfect trifecta of chaos, precision, and calm recovery. You’re basically a shooting star. Go ahead, make another wish — the course might just grant it.
description: Make an ace followed by a birdie followed by a par.
functionalDescription: gör en ace, en birdie och ett par efter varandra

name: Ace Hunter
quote: You're bagging aces and proving your aim is no accident — a true sharpshooter of the fairway. Each ace shines brighter than the last, unlocking new tiers of mastery. The more aces you claim, the higher your badge ascends — a testament to your precision, your power, and your legendary touch.
functionalDescription: totalt antal aces

name: Par Hunter
quote: Just like an expert tracker in the wild, you've honed your skills to consistently land those perfect pars. Whether you're navigating through dense forests or open fields, your keen eye and steady hand ensure you're always on target.
functionalDescription: totalt antal par

name: Comeback
quote: From the depths of disaster rises… you. That double bogey? Ancient history. Two birdies later and you've rewritten the script — from tragic comedy to triumphant comeback. Every hero needs a low point, right?
description: Make 2 consecutive birdies after a double bogey.
functionalDescription: man lyckas göra 2 birdies direkt efter en dubbel bogey

name: OB Hunter
quote: You're taking a more "scenic route". You know every nook, cranny, and out-of-bounds zone like the back of your hand. You're turning these off-limit areas into your personal playground. Your throws have the uncanny ability to find the wildest, most unexpected places.
functionalDescription: totalt antal OB man har

badges.name: Birdie Hunter
badges.quote: You've proven your ability to stalk the fairways, pounce on opportunities, and snag those elusive birdies with precision. Whether you're navigating dense woods or wide-open fields, your keen eye and steady hand ensure no birdie escapes your grasp. Keep your range finder handy and your putter ready, because the hunt is always on.

badges.name: Bird Collector
badges.quote: Catch birdies in different habitats.
badges.description: Make 3 birdies in a single round on X different courses

badges.name: Bullseye Hunter
badges.quote: The sacred center. No excuses, no nerves, no mercy. This is where putts are supposed to drop — and if they don't, you might want to fake an injury. Land here, and you've done what every player dreams of: parked it so close even your cardmates can't help but clap (or curse). The realm of tap-ins, glory, and just a hint of smug satisfaction.

badges.name: Course Hunter
badges.quote: While mere mortals are content playing the same old course day in and day out, you, my friend, are like the legendary Hopparcarlsson, bounding from course to course with the agility and curiosity of a mythical creature. You've traversed the hills, valleys, and treacherous terrains of countless disc golf courses, leaving no tee pad unvisited and no basket unconquered.

badges.name: Distance Hunter
badges.quote: From short layouts to monster courses, your legs have seen it all. Congrats, Distance Hunter — who needs a gym membership when chasing plastic already makes you a world traveler?

badges.name: Eagle Hunter
badges.quote: You don't just play the fairway — you own it. As an Eagle Hunter, you've unleashed precision drives and fearless putts to conquer what few can: scoring two under par. Whether it's a perfect flex line through the woods or a monster putt from downtown, you've proven that eagles aren't luck — they're skill, focus, and a little disc magic.
badges.description: Score your first eagle

badges.name: Rollercoaster
badges.quote: Every hole a thrill ride! You turned the match into a whirlwind of highs and lows, surprises, and nail-biting moments. Who needs boring consistency when you can conquer the course with pure chaos and come out on top? Strap in
badges.description: Go birdie to bogey at least twice in one round

badges.name: Three Wishes
badges.quote: You rub the lamp, I deliver: One triple bogey, one turkey, one throw-in. Don't say I didn't warn you!
badges.description: Rub the lamp and unlock three secret wishes. The Genie listens… but grants them in unexpected ways.

badges.name: Ace Hunter
badges.quote: You're bagging aces and proving your aim is no accident — a true sharpshooter of the fairway. Each ace shines brighter than the last, unlocking new tiers of mastery. The more aces you claim, the higher your badge ascends — a testament to your precision, your power, and your legendary touch.

badges.name: Par Hunter
badges.quote: Just like an expert tracker in the wild, you've honed your skills to consistently land those perfect pars. With each careful shot, you demonstrate a mastery of precision and strategy that would make any disc golfer proud. Whether you're navigating through dense forests or open fields, your keen eye and steady hand ensure you're always on target.

badges.name: Bogey Hunter
badges.quote: While others are chasing birdies, you've mastered the fine art of turning every hole into an adventure. Whether it's a defiant tree or a stubborn hill that mocks your every throw, you bravely face each obstacle with a smirk and a shrug.

badges.name: Comeback
badges.quote: From the depths of disaster rises… you. That double bogey? Ancient history. Two birdies later and you've rewritten the script — from tragic comedy to triumphant comeback. Every hero needs a low point, right?
badges.description: Make 2 consecutive birdies after a double bogey.

badges.name: OB Hunter
badges.quote: You're taking a more "scenic route". You know every nook, cranny, and out-of-bounds zone like the back of your hand. You're turning these off-limit areas into your personal playground. Your throws have the uncanny ability to find the wildest, most unexpected places.

badges.name: Three Wishes
badges.quote: You rub the lamp, I deliver: One triple bogey, one turkey, one throw-in. Don't say I didn't warn you!
badges.description: Rub the lamp and unlock three secret wishes. The Genie listens… but grants them in unexpected ways.

badges.name: Ace Hunter
badges.quote: You're bagging aces and proving your aim is no accident — a true sharpshooter of the fairway. Each ace shines brighter than the last, unlocking new tiers of mastery. The more aces you claim, the higher your badge ascends — a testament to your precision, your power, and your legendary touch.

badges.name: Par Hunter
badges.quote: Just like an expert tracker in the wild, you've honed your skills to consistently land those perfect pars. With each careful shot, you demonstrate a mastery of precision and strategy that would make any disc golfer proud. Whether you're navigating through dense forests or open fields, your keen eye and steady hand ensure you're always on target.

badges.name: Bogey Hunter
badges.quote: While others are chasing birdies, you've mastered the fine art of turning every hole into an adventure. Whether it's a defiant tree or a stubborn hill that mocks your every throw, you bravely face each obstacle with a smirk and a shrug.

badges.name: Comeback
badges.quote: From the depths of disaster rises… you. That double bogey? Ancient history. Two birdies later and you've rewritten the script — from tragic comedy to triumphant comeback. Every hero needs a low point, right?
badges.description: Make 2 consecutive birdies after a double bogey.

badges.name: OB Hunter
badges.quote: You're taking a more "scenic route". You know every nook, cranny, and out-of-bounds zone like the back of your hand. You're turning these off-limit areas into your personal playground. Your throws have the uncanny ability to find the wildest, most unexpected places.

badges.name: Birdie Hunter
badges.quote: You're a true predator of the fairway, hunting down birdies with skill and precision.

badges.name: Bird Collector
badges.quote: Catch birdies in different habitats.
badges.condition: function (results, layout, courseId) {const birdies = results.filter((r) => { const hole = layout.holes.find((h) => h.holeNumber === r.holeNumber); return hole && r.score === hole.par - 1;}).length; return birdies >= 3 ? 1 : 0;}

badges.name: Bullseye Hunter
badges.quote: Land in the bullseye — your safe space.
badges.condition: function (results) { return results.some((r) => r.hitBullseye === true); }

badges.name: Course Collector
badges.quote: Your appetite for new courses is insatiable!
badges.condition: function (results) { const uniqueCourses = new Set(results.map((r) => r.courseId)); return uniqueCourses.size; }

badges.name: Eagle Man
badges.quote: You just caught a really rare bird man, be proud of yourself!
badges.description: Score your first eagle
badges.condition: function (results, layout) { return results.some((r) => { const hole = layout.holes.find((h) => h.number === r.holeNumber); return hole && r.score !== 1 && r.score === hole.par - 2; }); }

badges.name: Round Rollercoaster
badges.quote: Strap in — it's gonna be a bumpy ride!
badges.description: Go birdie to bogey at least twice in one round

badges.name: Three Wishes
badges.quote: Unlock three secret achievements.
badges.description: Unlock three secret achievements, and you can make a wish. Be careful what you wish for!

badges.name: Basket Marksman
badges.quote: You just found the holy grale of disc golf, now that's something to tell the kids about.
badges.condition: function (results) { return results.some((r) => r.score === 1 && r.isAce === true); }

badges.name: Comeback
badges.quote: What goes down must come up again. Your resilience is admirable!
badges.description: Make 2 consecutive birdies after a double bogey.
badges.condition: function (results, layout) { for (let i = 2; i < results.length; i++) { const hole1 = layout.holes.find((h) => h.number === results[i - 2].hole); const hole2 = layout.holes.find((h) => h.number === results[i - 1].hole); const hole3 = layout.holes.find((h) => h.number === results[i].hole); const dblBogey = hole1 && results[i - 2].score === hole1.par + 2; const birdie1 = hole2 && results[i - 1].score === hole2.par - 1; const birdie2 = hole3 && results[i].score === hole3.par - 1; if (dblBogey && birdie1 && birdie2) return true; } return false; }

badges.name: OB Hunter
badges.quote: Landing OB is never fun, but someone's gotta do it. Here's a consollation prize!
badges.condition: function (results) { const obHits = results.filter((r) => r.obCount).length; return obHits; }

badges.name: Birdie Hunter
badges.quote: You've proven your ability to stalk the fairways, pounce on opportunities, and snag those elusive birdies with precision. Whether you're navigating dense woods or wide-open fields, your keen eye and steady hand ensure no birdie escapes your grasp. Keep your range finder handy and your putter ready, because the hunt is always on.

badges.name: Birdie Hunter
badges.quote: You've proven your ability to stalk the fairways, pounce on opportunities, and snag those elusive birdies with precision. Whether you're navigating dense woods or wide-open fields, your keen eye and steady hand ensure no birdie escapes your grasp. Keep your range finder handy and your putter ready, because the hunt is always on.

Whether you're navigating dense woods or wide-open fields, your keen eye and steady hand ensure no birdie escapes your grasp. badges.quote: You've proven your ability to stalk the fairways, pounce on opportunities, and snag those elusive birdies with precision. Whether you're navigating dense woods or wide-open fields, your keen eye and steady hand ensure no birdie escapes your grasp. Keep your range finder handy and your putter ready, because the hunt is always on.

badges.name: Birdie Hunter
badges.quote: You've proven your ability to stalk the fairways, pounce on opportunities, and snag those elusive birdies with precision. Whether you're navigating dense woods or wide-open fields, your keen eye and steady hand ensure no birdie escapes your grasp. Keep your range finder handy and your putter ready, because the hunt is always on.

badges.name: Birdie Hunter
badges.quote: You've proven your ability to stalk the fairways, pounce on opportunities, and snag those elusive birdies with precision. Whether you're navigating dense woods or wide-open fields, your keen eye and steady hand ensure no birdie escapes your grasp. Keep your range finder handy and your putter ready, because the hunt is always on.

functionalDescription: totala antal rundor man har spelat
name: Round Hunter
quote: While others may dabble in a casual game here and there, you've taken the plunge into the deep end of disc golf obsession. Rain or shine, day or night, you’re out there.

name: Hole Hunter
quote: You've played more holes than a Swiss cheese factory has holes! Your dedication to disc golf is unmatched, racking up those holes one round at a time.
functionalDescription: totalt antal spelade hål
totalt antal kast man har samlat
name: Throw Hunter
quote:
While others are content with a few casual tosses, you've embraced the art of disc throwing with the fervor of a seasoned pro. Your arm has become a finely tuned machine.
Picture yourself as the legendary Robin Hood, but instead of arrows, you’re slinging discs.

name: Circle Two Hunter
quote: The wild frontier. Too far for comfort, too close to just lay up. This is where legends are forged — or where discs awkwardly wobble into three-putt nightmares. You’ve dared to stalk the outer rim and hunting glory from 20 meters out. Respect… or sympathy.
functionalDescription: totala gånger man landat i circle 2

name: Circle One Hunter
quote: Welcome to the promised land. Where heroes are made, putts are missed, and excuses are born. You’ve hunted down the prime real estate within 10 meters of the basket — now all you need is the nerve to cash in. No pressure… except all of it.

name: Inside Hunter
quote: Welcome to the circle of truth. Inside C1, there are no excuses — only pure focus, trembling knees, and the faint sound of someone whispering “don’t miss.” Every made putt here is a small victory against gravity, doubt and your own putting form.
functionalDescription: totalt antal klarade puttar i c1. inside

name: Outside Hunter
quote: This is where dreams go to die and accidental highlight reels. Circle 2 putts separate the fearless from the faint-hearted. You’re standing at 20+ meters, wind swirling, cardmates holding their breath — and somehow, you decide to send it. Nail enough of these, and you’re officially in the “Did you see that?!” club.
functionalDescription: totalt antal c2 puttar -outside

name: Putt hunter
quote: From casual tap-ins to clutch circle bombs — your putter’s seen it all. You’ve chained out, chained in, and chained glory. Your wrist might be tired, but your ego sure isn’t.
functionalDescription: totala mängden puttar som är inside eller outside

name: Recovery Hunter
quote: You took a hit but you didn’t fold. After the sting of a bogey, you stepped up, refocused, and dropped a par like a calm, disciplined warrior. That’s emotional recovery at its finest.
functionalDescription: när man gör par på hålet efter en bogey
tierDescriptionSuffix: pars after a bogey on previous hole.

name: Elite Recovery Hunter
quote: You took a bogey, stared it down and came back swinging. Birdies right after disaster? That’s not luck — that’s redemption with style. You don’t just bounce back… you make the course pay for its disrespect.
functionalDescription: när man gör birdie efter att man har gjort bogey på förra hålet.
tierDescriptionSuffix: birdies after a bogey on previous hole.

name: Triple Bogey Hunter
quote: Three over par might sting, but hey — at least you’re still counting. Every bogey tells a story, and yours just became a trilogy. Wipe the tears.
functionalDescription: totalt antal triple bogeys

name: Separation Hunter
quote: Whether you barely squeaked past your buddy with a single stroke or left the entire card wondering why they even showed up. Big or small, every separation tells a story: domination, survival or pure luck.
functionalDescription: Hur många strokes man vinner i en match över någon annan

name: Birdies On A Wire
quote: Once is luck, twice is skill, but a streak of birdies? That’s pure mastery. We see those magical runs where every hole seems to bend to your will. Your disc hunts, your opponents sweat and even the trees are impressed.
functionalDescription: hur många birdies man får på rad, hål efter hål.

name: Flock of Birdies
quote: Your scorecard is a forest of little birds, and each putt is a declaration: ‘I came. I saw. I birdied.’ Opponents may weep, but you’ll fly home victorious.
functionalDescription: Totala antal birdies man kan ta på en runda.

name: Subpar Star
quote: Where the chains sing and the scorecard smiles back at you. Whether it’s a lucky break or pure skill, each round under par is a victory dance — your discs might be flying, but your ego is soaring even higher!
functionalDescription: totala rundor man lyckas på under par.

name: Par Juggernaut
quote: So the score didn’t quite go as planned… maybe the wind was evil, maybe the trees were magnetic or maybe your disc just hates you personally. But hey — you finished the round, and that.. counts!
functionalDescription: totala rundor som slutar på över par.

name: Par Parade
quote: You didn’t soar, you didn’t crash — you just cruised straight down the middle. The Par Parade welcomes another perfectly average legend.
functionalDescription: Totalt antal par man gör under en runda

name: Parsistent
quote: Neither glory nor disaster lives here — only balance. To walk the path of consecutive pars is to embrace calm amid chaos. You’re not chasing aces, and you’re not searching for lost discs in the rough. You’re simply… Reliable.
functionalDescription: antal par i rad på en runda

name: Chasing Chains
quote: One ace is luck. Two is skill. But across multiple courses? That’s legend. You’ve traveled far, spreading chaos and chain-rattling glory wherever your discs have flown. Basket manufacturers silently thank you for testing their limits.
functionalDescription: Antal olika banor man gör ace på.

name: Bogey Bomber
quote: All aboard the Bogey Express! You didn’t choose this ride — it chose you. One mistake led to another, and before you knew it, you were the proud conductor of the most unwanted train in disc golf. Keep those spirits high and your discs lower next time… maybe the next stop is Par Station.
functionalDescription: antal bogeys man gör i rad på en runda.

name: Bogey Buffoon
quote: And there it is — another one! That’s right, folks, we’re witnessing history in the making. Every drive, every putt, every questionable decision — all leading to one glorious result: another bogey. Consistency is key, and this player’s got it in spades! You’ve earned this badge the hard way.
functionalDescription: antal bogeys totalt i en runda.

name: Outer Space
quote: Not quite parked, but close enough to make your cardmates nervous. This is the strike zone for big arms and bold hearts. Go for it or lay up?
functionalDescription: antal gånger man har landat i c2 på en runda.

name: Not to close!
quote: Edge of the circles, heart in your throat — you’ve hit C2 on back-to-back holes like a precision predator. The wild frontier bows to your skill… or trembles in fear.
functionalDescription: antal gånger man landar i cirkel 2 i rad på en runda

name: Inner Circle
quote: Precision like a modern day Picasso. You didn’t just throw a drive; you painted a line through the trees and stopped it right where dreams become tap-ins. Welcome to the circle of elite placement — now, dont miss!
functionalDescription: antal gånger man landar i cirkel 1 på en runda.

name: So Close!
quote: Center stage, no excuses. You’ve landed in C1 on consecutive holes, commanding the circle like a true tactician. Gravity, nerves and mere mortals beware — the basket is yours to tame, one precise throw at a time.
functionalDescription: antal gånger man landar cirkel 1 i rad på en runda.

name: OB Expertise
quote: You went OB, kissed the penalty goodbye and still clawed your way back to par. That’s not luck — that’s wizardry with a disc. Houdini would be proud. Next time, try staying in bounds though.
functionalDescription: Rädda ett par efter du har gått OB på samma hål.

name: Skilled Recovery
quote: OB? No problem. You’ve made a habit out of turning penalties into points. Like a phoenix with a putter, you rise from the ashes — and somehow still end up under par. Turning penaltys into poetry!
functionalDescription: Antal birdies man gjort efter gått OB på samma hål

name: Dominating
quote: Disc golf is about friendship — until the first throw. You’ve turned casual rounds into emotional damage, one win at a time. They’ll still invite you... eventually. Just give them time to recover from the scorecard trauma.
functionalDescription: antal gånger man vunnit en match mot en eller flera. (singel)

name: Turkey Hunter
quote: While others are happy catching a single birdie, you’ve set up a buffet. You’re carving up turkeys like it’s Thanksgiving every weekend. You turned into a full-blown serial birdie killer. If birdies had a ‘wanted’ list, your face would be on it. Gobble Gobble!
functionalDescription: antal turkeys man gjort totalt

name: Dead Center
quote: Dead center again and again — you’re turning the basket into your personal dartboard. Every Bullseye is a testament to focus, skill and a touch of pure, unrepentant smugness. The basket might start crying, but you just keep raining precision like it owes you money.
functionalDescription: antal gånger man landar i bullseye i rad

name: Nailed It
quote: You’ve turned pinpoint accuracy into an art form, and the bullseye? Yeah, it’s basically your home address now. Other players are still lining up their approach while you’re already reaching for your putter. You’re living under the basket, rent-free.
functionalDescription: antal gånger man landat i bullseye på en runda.

name: Throw-in Hunter
quote: From outside the circle, from the woods, from somewhere no one thought was possible — your disc finds the chains like it’s got GPS. Keep this up and people will stop calling it a throw-in… and start calling it a you-in.
functionalDescription: totala antal gånger man fått throw-in

name: Scramble Hunter
quote: Fairways? Overrated. You’ve made a career out of chaos. Lost in the rough, trapped behind trees, staring at impossible lies — and still, somehow, you save par like it’s no big deal. You don’t play the hole; you fight it. Every scramble is a rescue mission, and you’re the hero no one asked for but everyone respects.
functionalDescription: antal gånger man lyckats rädda par efter en dålig lie

name: Fairway Hunter
quote: Straight and steady wins the game — or at least avoids the trees. You’ve mastered the ancient art of keeping your disc where it’s supposed to go. No wild adventures into the rough, no desperate searches in knee-high grass. Keep it smooth!
functionalDescription: antal gånger man träffat fairway

name: No Conversion Hunter
quote: Some chase birdies — others chase redemption. You’ve stood in c1 countless times, dreaming of glory, only to watch another putt slide by the chains. This badge series celebrates your persistence, pain and unshakable hope that maybe next time... it’ll finally drop.
functionalDescription: totalt missade birdie chanser. man landar c1 men ändå tar par.

name: Smooth Criminal
quote: You’ve stared the bogey beast straight in the eye… and it blinked first. Round after round, you’ve danced through danger, dodged trees and defied gravity — all without a single blemish on your scorecard.
functionalDescription: totala antalet bogey fria rundor

name: Bounce Back
quote: Falling down is easy. Getting back up in style? That’s a true champion. For every bogey, you answered with a birdie, flipping the script and leaving the course shaking its invisible fist. This badge is proof that you fought back and won.
description: Follow up every bogey with a birdie during one 18 hole round.
functionalDescription: när man får birdie efter varje bogey på 18 hål. Minst 5 gånger.

name: Ultimate Comeback
quote: Triple bogey? Nah, that was just the setup. You’ve officially pulled off the rarest of feats — turning misery into momentum. You’re soaring from the ashes like a disc golf phoenix.
description: Make 3 consecutive birdies after a tripple bogey.
functionalDescription: gör 3 birdies i rad efter en trippel bogey

name: Double Eagle
quote: You didn’t play disc golf, you hunted. Every throw was a strike from above, wings spread, confidence high. The course never stood a chance.
description: Make two eagles in one round.
functionalDescription: Gör 2 eagles i samma runda

name: Eagle Eye
quote: You didn’t just play it safe; you tamed it. One perfect drive, one fearless putt, and suddenly the course realized who’s in charge. Respect the beast? Nah. You own it.
description: Make an eagle on a par 4 less than 150m.
functionalDescription: Gör en eagle på en par 4 som är kortare än 150m.

name: Eagles Nest
quote: While others grind their way up the fairway like mortals, you chose violence. A par 5 is supposed to be a marathon — but you turned it into a sprint. Massive drive, surgical precision and an eagle that echoes across the course.
description: Make an eagle on a par 5 less than 230m.
functionalDescription: Gör en eagle på en par 5 som är mindre än 230m.

name: Tis the Season
quote: Santa’s got his sleigh — you’ve got the bag. While others unwrap gifts, you’re unwrapping birdies. The air is crisp, the spirit’s high, and every chain hit rings like a jingle bell. You’re might be on the nauthy list…
description: Play a round at Christmas.
functionalDescription: Spela på julafton.

name: Happy New Year
quote: While everyone else is popping champagne, you’re popping drives. Nothing says 'new year, new me' like finishing with a round in the cold, grinning through the fireworks echoing over the fairway. Here’s to fresh starts, clean cards and hopefully fewer double bogeys next year.
description: Play a round at New Years Eve.
functionalDescription: spela på nyårsafton

name: The Albatross
quote: Rarer than a hole-in-one, stranger than a bogey-free round with no tree hits. Legends say the discgolf gods only allow one of these per decade. Whether it was skill, fate or a lucky bounce off a squirrel, you’ve joined a mythical club few will ever believe exists. Tell the story proudly — no one’s gonna believe you anyway.
description: Make an Albatross.
functionalDescription: gör en albatross

name: We're Sinking!
quote: You didn’t just miss the fairway — you declared war on it. Somewhere between your third out-of-bounds and that heroic 40-foot ‘save,’ reality sank faster than your confidence. But hey, you finished the hole… eventually.
description: Get 4-7 strokes above par on a single hole.
functionalDescription: när man gör 4-7 kast över par på ett hål.

name: Once you pop..
quote:
This wasn’t just a bad hole. This was a documentary-worthy collapse. Lost discs, bad luck and questionable decisions — it had everything. You didn’t just blow up; you detonated.
Once you pop, you can’t stop.
description: Get 8-12 above par on a single hole.
functionalDescription: gå 8-12 kast över par på ett hål

name: Nuclear
quote: You’ve officially gone beyond bogeys and logic. This wasn’t just a bad hole… it was a full-scale meltdown. Trees, OBs, water and tears — you left nothing unscathed. You’ll wear this badge like a warning label. Ka-Boom!
description: Get 13+ above par on a single hole.
functionalDescription: Gå mer än 13 kast över par på ett hål

name: Clean Slate
quote: You played flawlessly… and still lost. Every throw on point, every putt straight as an arrow, yet victory slipped through your fingers. Take a deep breath, polish that ego and remember: sometimes perfection isn’t enough.
description: Lose a match without a single bogey.
functionalDescription: Förlora en match trots att man gått bogey free.

name: There's Always A Bigger Fish
quote: You nailed that ace, you felt unstoppable… and then it happened. Someone out there had the bigger fish. Humbling? Yes. Motivating? Absolutely. Go ahead, plot your comeback — the water’s just getting interesting.
description: Lose a match with an ace.
functionalDescription: Förlora trots att man lyckats få ett ace.

name: Bumpy Ride
quote: Ups and downs, highs and lows. Buckle up, because consistency clearly isn’t invited to this ride.
description: Get birdie then bogey on consecutive holes atleast 3 times.
functionalDescription: när man först får birde och sen bogey 3 gånger i rad. Eller bogey och sen birdie osv.

name: Megacoaster
quote: No middle ground, just pure chaos. Birdies and bogeys all day — and a corcscrew in the middle. You didn’t play golf, you survived an emotional thrill ride.
description: Win a match without a single par.
functionalDescription: När man vinner utan något par på sitt kort.

name: Ace Race
quote: You did it with style, flair and a little bit of magic. That ace wasn’t just a throw; it was a statement. Your opponents might still be picking their jaws off the ground, but you? You’re already plotting your next legendary shot.
description: Win a match with an ace.
functionalDescription: Vinn med ett ace på kortet.

name: The Haul
quote: This wasn’t a clean round, it was a beautiful mess held together by pure determination and maybe a few lucky putts. Victory doesn’t always sparkle — sometimes it stumbles, grunts and still crosses the finish line first.
description: Win a game with atleast 7 bogeys.
functionalDescription: man vinner trots att man har 7 bogeys.

name: Speedster
quote: Blink and you’ll miss it — literally. You tore through 18 holes faster than most people find their first disc. Who needs warm-ups or strategy when you’ve got raw momentum and questionable life choices? The clock didn’t stand a chance — and probably neither did your scorecard.
description: Finish 18 holes within an hour.
functionalDescription: Spela 18 hål under 1 timme.

name: Under the Stars
quote: While others were dreaming, you were discing. Out there in the middle of the night — The cosmic silence. Whether it’s dedication or insomnia, we salute your glow-in-the-dark grind.
description: Play a round at night, between 01:00 – 03:00.
functionalDescription: Spela en runda mellan 01.00 och 02.59

name: Rise And Shine
quote: While most people hit snooze, you hit the fairway. Playing before sunrise isn’t for the faint of heart — or the fully asleep. You’re officially part of the dawn patrol and chasing birdies while the world’s still yawning.
description: Play a round before sunrise, between 03:00 – 04:59
functionalDescription: spela en runda mellan 03 och 04:59

name: Nightowl
quote: Some call it late… you call it prime time. When the sun sets and everyone else packs up, you come alive. Maybe it’s focus, maybe it’s madness — either way, the darkness has never seen a smoother drive.
description: Play a round after sunset, between 23:00 – 00:59
functionalDescription: spela en runda mellan 23 och 00.59

name: The Turnaround
quote: They thought you were out of it — but you were just warming up. A comeback like this doesn’t just happen; it’s built on grit, focus and a healthy dose of disbelief from your opponents. Never count you out again.
description: Win a game after being at least 3 points behind the leader.
functionalDescription: man vinner fast man man ligger 3 poäng bakom vid ett tillfälle

name: Momentum Shift
quote: You felt the energy change — one throw, one hole, one spark — and suddenly, the impossible looked easy. You didn’t just catch up; you flipped the script and stole the spotlight. That’s what we call a shift in power.
description: Win a game after being at least 4 points behind the leader.
functionalDescription: man vinner fast man man ligger 4 poäng bakom vid ett tillfälle

name: Phoenix
quote: From the ashes of triple bogeys and bad tree kicks, you rose again. The comeback of comebacks. The myth made real. You didn’t just win — you resurrected your round and scorched the field in the process.
description: Win a game after being at least 5 points behind the leader.
functionalDescription: vinn fast man ligger 5 poäng efter vid ett tillfälle.

name: Lightning doesn't strike twice?
quote:
One ace is luck… two in the same round is borderline supernatural.
At this point you're not playing disc golf — you're bending physics for the sport.
Who said lightning doesn't strike twice?
description: Make two aces same round.
functionalDescription: 2 aces samma runda

name: GOAT
quote: Three aces. One round. No mercy. The kind of round people whisper about in parking lots and group chats for years to come. Bow down mortals — the GOAT has arrived.
description: Make three aces same round.
functionalDescription: 3 aces samma runda

name: Friendly Fire
quote: Sometimes you win, sometimes your friend gets lucky… repeatedly. Take the Ls, keep the vibes high, every loss is just future comeback fuel. Lose enough games to prove you truly value friendship…
functionalDescription: När man kommer sist X antal matcher när man är flera på ett kort.
